question: I have gestational diabetes. I am so exhausted all the time. I have to make myself get up and exercise and go out with my fiance. I only have 4 weeks left. But I crave sweets so bad! And sometimes I cheat..and I feel terrible.  I miss being able to eat whatever I want! Only 4 weeks and hopefully the gestational diabetes will go away. And I'll be holding my handsome baby boy.
title: Exhausted!
